subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Pirela will be activated Wednesday, but with big hits from Jacoby Ellsbury and Mark Teixeira and Michael Pineda pitching like a staff ace, the Yankees cruised past Toronto.
snippet: Jose Pirela will be activated Wednesday, but with big hits from Jacoby Ellsbury and Mark Teixeira and Michael Pineda pitching like a staff ace, the Yankees cruised past Toronto.
